Eg: This is my Home expenses account

1.How to register? 
 A:You can register to the app by any of the foll options:- 
-email id/password 
-ph num/password -Google login 
-Facebook login


 2.How to create an Account? 
A:If you are new a new user, after you register to the app you will see a Add account button on home page. 
Click the button to add accounts. 
You can also add account by clicking the button on the extreme right of the app name. It will take you to the Accounts list page.Click on the + symbol to add new account on the page.


3.How to edit Account details? 
A:Click the button on the extreme right of the app name to go to the Accounts List page. From the Account List click on the account you want to edit.


4.How to delete a account? 
A:Click the button on the extreme right of the app name to go to the Accounts List page. From the Account List click on the account you want to delete.It will display the account details. Click on the delete button to delete the account. 
Note: Only Admin the creator of the account will have the permissions to delete the account.


5.How to make an account the default account so that it is displayed at the top? 
A:Click the button on the extreme right of the app name to go to the Accounts List page. From the Account List click on the account you want to make default.Check the Make Default checkbox and click OK button.


6.How to view all the Accounts? 
A:Click the button on the extreme right of the app name to go to the Accounts List page.


7.How to add income or expense transaction? 
A:After adding a account, On the home page, click on the income or expense button of the same account tab to add transaction in the account.


8.How to view transactions of a account or go to Transaction List page? 
 A:On the home page,Select the account tab and click on Transactions button to view the transactions.


9.How to view transactions of account by member,yearly,monthly or weekly? 
A:On the Transactions List page, Click on the overflow menu on the extreme right of the Account name on the top bar. It will display Filter options by member,yearly,monthly or weekly etc.


10.How to edit a transaction? A:From the Transaction List Page,Click on the transaction you want to edit to edit the transaction.


11.How to delete a transaction? 
A:From the Transaction List Page,Click on the transaction you want to edit to edit the transaction. 
Note:Account Transfer transactions cannot be deleted.


 12.How to do account transfer? 
A.On the home page,Select the account tab and click on Transfer button.Select the 'To' account and other details to transfer the amount.


13.How to add members to a account? 
A.On the home page,Select the account tab and at the bottom there is Members section. 
-Click on the add members button, it will display a add member details page. Fill the details and click on OK.This will add the member in the account and send a welcome email to the member. 
-You can also add the member by clicking the contacts button to add a member from your PhoneBook.


14.How to view the members in an account? /nA.On the home page,Select the account tab and click on the Members label to view the members list.


15.How to view a member details? 
A.On the home page,Select the account tab and at the bottom there is Members section. Click on the member to view the details.


16.How to delete members of a account? 
A.On the home page,Select the account tab and click on the Members label to view the members list. Click on the member del button to delete the member from the Member List.


17.How can a new added member login to the app to see his accounts? 
A:The new member can register to the app by the same email id/ph num which has been added to the account by the Admin.


18.How to view summary of all accounts? 
A.On the home page,Select the account tab and click on Summary button.


19.How to export summary of the account to a pdf? 
A.On the home page,Select the account tab and click on Summary button.On the Summary page, Click on the overflow menu on the extreme right of the Summary page on the top bar. It will display Export as PDF option.
You need to grant permission to use this feature.
